Class DeconflictionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<MapItem>
        • com.atakmap.android.maps.DeconflictionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class DeconflictionAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<MapItem>
    List adapter for filtered track menu.
